detaileddescription.para: Verifies script execution of the zeroth scriptPubKey of tx output and zeroth scriptSig and witness of tx input.

memberdef.argsstring: (CMutableTransaction &spendingTx, CCoinsViewCache &coins, CMutableTransaction &creationTx, const CScript &scriptPubKey, const CScript &scriptSig, const CScriptWitness &witness)
memberdef.name: BuildTxs

detaileddescription.para: Builds a creationTx from scriptPubKey and a spendingTx from scriptSig and witness such that spendingTx spends output zero of creationTx. Also inserts creationTx's output into the coins view.
